name: lime production, milled, packed | lime, packed | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7385/documentation

Packed lime products do all use the module "packing, lime products".;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.];Water flows were removed for v3.5 as they are included in supplying activity 'lime production, milled, loose'.



includes the packing and one part of the total heating energy for "production" and "administration"
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/081:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay/0810:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: data are from only one company in Switzerland (KFN)
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The company KFN works on a technically high level.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
